mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase_request (ma_pr, ngay_yeu_cau, sys_id_user, loai_yeu_cau) VALUES (#{maPR}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{nguoiYeuCau}, #{loaiYeuCau});
